author: daviwil
body: I'm currently building my code against the NanoServer reference assemblies which target CoreCLR RC2.  Their reference assemblies have System.Security.SecureString versioned as 4.0.0.  Can we change our temporary package to have that version so that my module assembly can be loaded up into PowerShell?

comments.author: daviwil
comments.body: I should mention that this is a high priority blocking issue for migration of PowerShell Editor Services to CoreCLR, so it'd be great if I could get a new build for Windows with the changed version ASAP.  Thanks!

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Thanks! Can do this easy peasy.

title: Change version of System.Security.SecureString from 1.0.0 to 4.0.0
